articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Messages and Letters from Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Messages and Letters from Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from different countries on the occasions of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the 3rd anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA and the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from the chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United), the leader of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), the chairman of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist), the general secretary of the Communist Party of Syria (Unity), the general secretary of the Syrian Arab Socialist Union Party, the chairman and the secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, the general chairman and the general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, the chairman of the Party for Socialist Choice of Romania, the chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, the chairman of the Socialist Party of Benin and the chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt. 
					
					 They also came  from the minister of Defence of Syria who doubles as deputy commander-in-chief of its Armed Forces, the deputy general secretary of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, the vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, the deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana, the co-chairman of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, the chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea and other high-ranking political, public, military and economic officials of Russia, China, Nepal, Malaysia, Myanmar, Mongolia, Syria, Singapore, Kuwait, Thailand, Qatar, Oman, Iran, Indonesia, Denmark, Germany, Romania, Bulgaria, Belarus, Switzerland, Sweden, the Czech Republic, Poland, the UK, Ukraine, Italy, Guinea, Nigeria, Benin, Angola, Egypt, Mexico, Brazil, Canada and Colombia, and representatives of international bodies, Juche idea study organizations, organizations for supporting Korea's reunification and friendly organizations.
					
					 The messages and letters praised Kim Jong Il for winning one victory after another in the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. confrontation, demonstrating the dignity of Songun Korea and steering the cause of global independence. They stressed that his immortal exploits would shine forever.
					
					 They said that the DPRK is fully displaying its might as a military power and dynamically advancing towards the eminence of a thriving nation as it is holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme commander of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk's life as a hero is a brilliant model to be followed by all revolutionaries across the world struggling for independence and justice, they noted.
					
					 They expressed conviction that the army and people of the DPRK would work hard to accomplish the cause of Juche revolution, the cause of Songun revolution, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Cooking up Conspiratorial Documents against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Cooking up Conspiratorial Documents against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies released the following statement on Tuesday:
					 The truth behind the conspiratorial "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. and other hostile forces against the DPRK in the UN arena is being self-exposed.
					
					 It has been disclosed that the "report of the Commission of Inquiry" on the human rights performance in the DPRK, which served as a basis of the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" rammed through the plenary meeting of the 69th UN General Assembly last December by hostile forces, was no more than a false document cooked up on the basis of false "testimonies" made by human scum.
					
					 As reported recently, defector from  the north Sin Tong Hyok, who had come out as a primary "testifier" when working out the above-said "report of the Commission of Inquiry", confessed that he had told lies about his past and pledged not to be involved in such "human rights campaign" against the DPRK in the future.
					
					 As the DPRK had already clarified, Sin is a swindler who had appeared with false name and career and no more than a parasite who has prolonged his remaining days by noisily trumpeting about the misinformation provided by his master.
					
					 Sin had styled himself a "survivor" in the "concentration camp of political offenders" that does not exist in the DPRK, no more than a sheer lie and a fiction.
					
					 He is a heinous criminal who raped a girl under age that can never be pardoned in Europe and all other parts of the world.
					
					 He should not only admit his lies but make clear his true colors as a criminal. 
					
					If he fails to do so, the DPRK will bring to light his crimes before the whole world.
					
					 What was ridiculous was that Bush, Kerry and others in the ruling camp of the U.S., not content with resorting to their desperate anti-DPRK campaign, let even such liars as Sin appear at a "high-level meeting on the human rights performance in the north" and other arenas and highly praised him. These disgusting behaviors remind one of a drowning man catching at even a straw.
					
					 The U.S. authorities, bereft of reason as they were hell-bent on their hostile policy toward the DPRK, staged a farce by getting such a swindler involved in their anti-DPRK human rights racket, although they were aware of his true colors. But it only brought to light the true colors of their conspiratorial "human rights" racket before the world. 
					
					The U.S. "invited" Sin to the UN and other arenas and staged "hearing" and distributed "the report of the CI" worked out on the basis of false testimonies as a UN document before cooking up a UN "resolution." This cannot but be the most mean and shameless act of flouting the conscience of the world people.
					
					Sin's admission of his lies goes to prove that everything told by those who claim to be "defectors from the north" cannot be trusted and the above-said report is peppered with sheer lies.
					
					 So needless to say, all the "resolutions on the human rights" forcibly adopted against the DPRK on the basis of such false documents are invalid.
					
					 It is bitter shame on the UN that it was involved in the racket against the DPRK, taken in by the U.S. plots.
					
					 The hostile forces should retract at once the false documents including the "resolutions on the human rights" based on the lies told by human scum, though belatedly.
					
					 The international community should take a fair stand, keenly aware that the U.S. and other hostile forces' "human rights" racket against the DPRK is utterly irrelevant to the defence of genuine human rights and it is the most dangerous move to tarnish its image and find a pretext to invade it, to all intents and purposes.

articles.title: Joint Meeting of Government, Political Parties and Organizations of DPRK Held
articles.content:
Joint Meeting of Government, Political Parties and Organizations of DPRK Held 
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to carry out the tasks for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address. 
					 Present at the meeting were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, chairperson of a friendly party, senior officials of the working people's and social organizations, officials concerned of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and representatives of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK. 
					
					 The meeting discussed agenda item "On opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification with concerted efforts of the entire nation this year marking the 70th anniversary of national liberation in hearty response to the historic New Year address of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un".
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report which was followed by speeches by Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Kang Ji Yong, director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un is a banner of reunification and patriotism which most correctly reflects the ardent desire and will of all Koreans for reunification and a great appeal powerfully arousing them to the nationwide movement for independent reunification, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 They underlined the need to remove the danger of war, ease the tension and create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer prod the south Korean authorities into confrontation with fellow countrymen but desist from pursuing an anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and reckless acts of aggression and boldly make a policy switch, they urged.
					
					 They called upon the countries concerned interested in the Korean issue and the international community to refrain from inciting confrontation between the fellow countrymen and deteriorating the situation and extend support to the positive efforts of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean relations and reunifying the country. 
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The north and the south should refrain from seeking confrontation of systems while absolutizing their own ideologies and systems but achieve great national unity true to the principle of By Our Nation Itself to satisfactorily resolve the reunification issue in conformity with the common interests of the nation. 
					
					 The DPRK is ready to have candid discussion on all the problems arising in mending the north-south relations and boldly settle them. It is possible to resume the suspended high-level contacts and hold inter-sector talks if the south Korean authorities are sincere in their stand on improving the inter-Korean relations through dialogue. 
					
					 People from all walks of life in the north and the south should turn out in the general advance for a fresh leap in the reunification movement in the noble idea of great national unity, transcending the differences in ideas, political views and isms this year, 70 years since the national division. 
					
					 An appeal to all Koreans was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: All Koreans Called upon to Turn Out to Open Up Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification This Year
articles.content:
All Koreans Called upon to Turn Out to Open Up Broad Avenue to Independent Reunification This Year
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- An appeal to all Koreans was adopted at a joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK held here on Tuesday.
					 The appeal said:
					
					 The New Year address made by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is a signpost and a banner of the sacred struggle for all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year.
					
					 Let all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad respond to the calls of the historic New Year address with a nationwide struggle for improving the north-south relations and reunifying the country this year when the prospect for national reunification and the future of the nation will be decided!
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to advance hand in hand with whoever loves the country and the nation and aspires after national reunification, not absolutizing the differing ideologies and systems in the drive for reunification.
					
					 If one regards his fellow countrymen as the "enemy" and seeks unilateral "unification of social systems", opposing our ideology and social system, north-south relations can never be mended.
					
					 Let us make this year marking the 70th anniversary of national division and the 65th anniversary of the outbreak of the Korean war the first year free from war drills staged with foreign forces against fellow countrymen, a year of history when peace will be settled on the Korean peninsula!
					
					 The DPRK is ready to settle all issues in improving the relations sincerely and candidly and clarified a crucial stand on north-south dialogue.
					
					The north and the south should no longer waste time and energy over pointless arguments and trifling matters.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should do away with the reckless "theory of unification of social systems" which will invite only confrontation and war, smoothly settle the reunification issue in the interests common to the nation and take the road of improving inter-Korean relations and achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity from the new viewpoint and new attitude, away from the narrow-minded and hostile attitude.
					
					 The political parties and organizations of south Korea should actively swim with the giant trend of history to bring about a fundamental change in the inter-Korean relations, and refrain from putting brake on its wheel nor obstructing it.
					
					 We should significantly celebrate the 15th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of national liberation as nationwide grand events to go down in the history of the movement for national reunification.
					
					 Let the north and the south hold events common to the nation, grand reunification meetings of people of all social standings to make hurrah for reunification and enthusiasm for national unity prevail over the country where Koreans live!
					
					 Let us actively promote contacts and exchanges between the north and the south in sports, cultural and all other fields to rejoin the severed ties and blood vessels of the nation and demonstrate advantages and commonness of the nation before the whole world!
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we express the expectation that those countries concerned and the international community will refrain from inciting confrontation between fellow countrymen and escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and extend support and encouragement to our positive efforts to mend the inter-Korean relations and reunify the country.
					
					 We ardently call upon all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad once again to turn out as one with the strong desire for reunification and patriotism and dynamically open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this significant year.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador to DPRK 
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy Tuesday to mark the 56th anniversary of the victory in the Cuban revolution.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission who is also chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Pak Kun Gwang and Sin Hong Chol and other officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador, addressing the reception, said that a new day broke for the Cuban people on January 1, 1959. Cuba has registered a lot of successes over the past 56 years, he added. 
					
					 The Cuban people are proud of having friendly and cooperative ties with the hard-working and resourceful and heroic Korean people led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, he stressed.
					
					 Noting that Cuba would make positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK, he wished the Korean people bigger progress in the new year.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, speaking next, said the victory in the Cuban revolution was a historic event which opened the road of an independent life to the Cuban people who had been subject to exploitation and oppression for centuries, and proclaimed the birth of the first socialist state on the American continent.
					
					He recalled that the Cuban people have advanced the socialist cause through a heroic struggle under the leadership of Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 The Korean people are rejoiced over the successes made by the Cuban people in implementing the decision made at the 6th Congress of the Communist Party of Cuba, he said, adding they would always stand by the fraternal Cuban people in the joint struggle for the victory of the socialist cause for independence against imperialism.

articles.title: KPA Servicepersons Set Out on Visit to Revolutionary Battle Site
articles.content:
KPA Servicepersons Set Out on Visit to Revolutionary Battle Site
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army (KPA) started for the revolutionary battle site on Mt. Madu on Tuesday.
					 The revolutionary battle site, built as a secret base in Anju area during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, played the role of a regional leading base and important military operational base in the western part of Korea. 
					
					 The site is associated with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung for the historic cause of Korea's liberation. 
					
					 It is to be visited by the exemplary servicepersons of the KPA, cadets and students selected from the military schools at all levels and revolutionary schools.
					
					 Before their leaving, they gathered in front of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il erected at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					  They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Om Hyang Chol, chairman of the KPA Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 With the flags bearing the immortal beaming images of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il fluttering in the van of their march, they marched for the revolutionary battle site, holding the flag on which the letters saying "Never abandon revolutionary faith though one may die" were written.

articles.title: National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Opens
articles.content:
National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize Opens 
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The 41st National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize opened at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street Tuesday.
					 The contest will draw more than 10 000 youth and students selected from provinces. Divided into groups of senior secondary schools and junior secondary schools and primary schools, its participants will compete in 17 events including basketball, volleyball, table tennis, Taekwon-Do and ssirum (Korean wrestling). It will be held in Pyongyang, Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province, Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province and Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province from January to August.
					
					 The opening ceremony was attended by Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and school youth and children. 
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, made an opening speech.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there was a basketball match between boys of Kang Ban Sok Senior Secondary School and Undok Senior Secondary School of Hanggu District of Nampho.

articles.title: Briefing on Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang Int'l Tourist Zone to Be Given
articles.content:
Briefing on Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang Int'l Tourist Zone to Be Given
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A briefing on investment will be given in the DPRK in April-May to develop the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang international tourist zone.
					 A number of overseas Koreans and foreign investors have expressed their deep interest in the project.
					
					 In this regard, KCNA had an interview with O Ung Gil, general manager of the Wonsan Area Development Corporation.
					
					 Noting that the participants in the briefing are scheduled to tour Wonsan City and Mt. Kumgang, the general manager said:
					
					 The Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang international tourist zone began to be developed under a June Juche 103 (2014) decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 The master plan for its development was completed, and a sectional planning and the infrastructure construction and repairing are now under way.
					
					 The development zone covers an area of 430 square kilometers, which involves Wonsan City and Popdong, Anbyon, Thongchon and Kosong counties and some parts of Kumgang County in Kangwon Province.
					
					 This area is famous for lots of historical relics, tourist resources and beauty spots, including Phyohun and Singye temples, lakes Sijung and Tongjong, Ullim Falls and Songdowon beach.
					
					 In particular, Mt. Kumgang is noted for its natural beauties of mountains and valleys and newly-built Songdowon International Children's Camp and the Masikryong Ski Resort are enjoying great popularity.
					
					 We will carry on the development and tourism in the area at the same time through brisk exchange, and our general goal is to turn the zone into a world-level one with high service standard and capability.

articles.title: Big Efforts Paid to Aquaculture in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Efforts Paid to Aquaculture in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- In hearty response to the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address, big efforts are paid to developing aquaculture in the DPRK.
					 Transplanting of high-yield species of tangle is coming to an end at aquaculture farms across the country.
					
					 The farms also strive to increase marine products, including mussel, scallop and trepang.
					
					 The Kumipho Offshore Farm and the Ongjin Offshore Farm set a ground to drastically raise the productivity of seaweeds by introducing scientific method of cultivation.
					
					 The Pupho Offshore Farm is stepping up the work to transplant and thin out tangle.
					
					 The Munchon Foodstuff Factory, located on eastern seaside, too, directs efforts to aquaculture.

articles.title: Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm 
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A new mushroom farm took its shape in Pyongyang City as a model in the country.
					 The farm consists of arch-style open-air cultivation ground and production buildings, which were built in a peculiar way. It has high-level integrated production system ranging from raw materials feeding to forwarding.
					
					 With two incubation rooms and 16 cultivation rooms, the farm boasts of all conditions necessary for mushroom growth.
					
					 The production control system and the management information system are closely combined at the farm.
					
					 The farm developed and introduced new vessels suitable to automating and streamlining the production process.
					
					 An e-library is also operating at the farm.

articles.title: DPRK Students Enjoy Winter Vacation
articles.content:
DPRK Students Enjoy Winter Vacation
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Students and pupils are now enjoying winter vacation in the DPRK.
					 Many of them are intent on the study of basic science and special knowledge at the Grand People's Study House and libraries in different parts of the country.
					
					 Han Po Ram, a student of Kim Chaek University of Technology, told KCNA that it is her goal to read more books during the vacation.
					
					 The main vacation program of students is to tour revolutionary battle sites and other historic sites, museums, exhibition houses and beauty spots in order to arm themselves with the revolutionary traditions of the Workers' Party of Korea and nourish their national pride and patriotism.
					
					 Jong Mi Yong, a student of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1, said at the Pyongyang Folklore Park:
					
					 The visit to Mangyongdae and Jonsung revolutionary sites and Korean Folklore Museum helped me know well about the undying feats of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the socialist country and deeply feel the honor of being a member of the resourceful Korean nation.
					
					 I will study harder to be a reliable worker for the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, students and pupils are cultivating their talents at schoolchildren's palaces, youth halls and children's houses across the country.
					
					 They are also seen spending time at such sports parks and recreation centers as People's Open-air Ice Rink, Munsu Water Park, Rungna Dolphinarium and Rungna 4-D Simulation Cinema.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Distorting History
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Distorting History
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan recently allowed the deletion of the description of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in the past from textbooks for senior high schools.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this proves the shamelessness and moral vulgarity peculiar to Japan keen on concealing its dirty history of aggression and inhuman crimes at any cost. It goes on:
					
					 The issue of history textbooks is, in essence, a sensitive political issue of whether Japan properly understands and approaches the past blood-stained history of aggression or not. It is also a yardstick distinguishing whether Japan has the willingness to educate the rising generation in a correct outlook on history or not.
					
					 However, the Japanese ultra-right forces are working hard to trample down even the inviolable idea of educating the younger generation in history as it is and implant the militarist outlook on history and revanchism into their minds.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the acts of tampering with history have reached the phase of totally twisting and denying it, going beyond the stage of concealing and playing down it under the zealous support and patronage of the Japanese authorities. 
					
					 A whirlwind of implanting a wrong outlook on history into the minds of the youngsters is now sweeping across Japan. This is a natural product of the political climate in Japan rushing headlong into the lurch to the right.
					
					 Japan's past crimes are neither buried into oblivion of history nor being forgotten by people no matter how much water flows under the bridge. 
					
					 Japan's persistent distortion of history will only invite international isolation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japan's Desperate "Claim to Tok Islets"
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japan's Desperate "Claim to Tok Islets"
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japanese government posted on its website a video clip dealing with its "claim to Tok Islets," says Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese government took the above-said action though it was fully proved by historical and legal evidence that Tok Islets belong to Korea. This is aimed to stir up at home social concern for "dominium over Tok Islets" and create a favorable environment for its moves to realize the ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 The Japanese ultra-right forces are working hard to prevent the enthusiasm to "grab Tok Islets" from waning among the people from the outset of the new year at any cost and, furthermore, step up their moves to realize the ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 This is the reason why the present Japanese government is seeking to sharply increase the budget in the future for intensifying the advertisement about "dominium over Tok Islets" at home and abroad. 
					
					 This frantic campaign staged by the present Japanese government from the outset of the year clearly hints at the political direction in the whole year and in the future.
					
					 The present Japanese government unhesitatingly dealt with the issues including the revision of the Constitution for allowing the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" last year though the successive regimes dared not do. It is becoming vocal making a "claim to Tok Islets" from the outset of the year. The international community is taking note of Japan's behavior and expressing deep concern over its evermore undisguised scenario for overseas aggression.
					
					 If Japan persistently follows the anachronistic road in disregard of the unanimous demand of the international community for dropping its ambition for territorial expansion, it will experience the same tragedy as what it suffered 70 years back, the commentary warns.

articles.title: U.S. Is Chiefly to Blame for Disturbing Security of Cyber Space: KCNA
articles.content:
U.S. Is Chiefly to Blame for Disturbing Security of Cyber Space: KCNA
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The public  in different countries and regions of the world and cyber experts of the U.S. are becoming increasingly vocal censuring it for perpetrating criminal acts abusing cyber space.
					 Snowden, former contractor of CIA, disclosed at a press conference that it was none other than the U.S. which started the state sponsored hacking attack in the world. McAfee, founder of an American information security company refuted the U.S. administration's claim that cyber attack on Sony Pictures Entertainment was made by north Korea. He noted that it could be done by those inside the U.S., adding that he knew hackers but would not mention them.
					
					 As data show, the U.S. attached importance to the cyber war worldwide and has invested a huge amount of funds in it.
					
					 The U.S. set up a huge cyber command at the U.S. Defence Department and has augmented its position and authority.
					
					 The Washington Post reported that in 2013 the Defence Department decided to enlarge the cyber command more than five times that in the past and beef it up as a cyber force capable of mounting hot attacks.
					
					 At present the U.S. regards cyber space as a means for preemptive attack on other countries. The U.S. administration and Pentagon consider cyber space as the fifth sphere for dominating the world and are seeking hegemony over it.
					
					 Having totally transferred the U.S. forces' actions in cyber sphere to offensive cyber strategy, the U.S. is working hard to realize its ambition to dominate the world at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. singled out not only those countries opposed to it including the DPRK and Iran but also regional powers, including Russia and China, and even its allies, its rivals, as targets of its cyber strategy which involves vast fields of politics, economy, military, education, culture, etc.
					
					 The development of weapons for cyberattack has been stepped up and a huge amount of funds have been spent for its purpose with the approval of the U.S. Administration and its Congress.
					
					 The U.S. became the first in the world to mount state-sponsored cyberterror attack on other countries. 
					
					 A typical example of the above-said attack was the attack on Iran's nuclear facilities by dint of vicious virus of Stuxnet in 2010.
					
					 2011 alone witnessed over 230 cyberattack operations of the U.S. targeting different countries. 
					
					 Recent reports released by software companies making virus vaccine said that it is the United States where the development of software for computer hacking and vicious code for cyber attack is more rampant than any other countries.
					
					 The U.S. is abusing its latest scientific and technological successes as war weapons for realizing its ambition for world domination. It is a serious and undisguised challenge to the development of human civilization and to the international community desirous of the world's peace and stability.
					
					 The United States is a disturber of the world's peace, an arch criminal disturbing the security of cyber space and chieftain of cyberterror attack and cyberwar maniac.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to dominate the world through a cyberwar is nothing but a foolish daydream.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to properly understand that today's latest IT is not its monopoly.

articles.title: U.S. Plans Deployment of More Warships in Waters off Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Plans Deployment of More Warships in Waters off Korea
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is mulling deploying ultra-modern Aegis warships in Yokosuka base, Japan this summer, according to Yonhap News of south Korea on January 17.
					 It announced it would deploy two Aegis warships with ballistic missile attack capability in the base by 2017.
					
					 The south Korean media comment that this is part of the U.S. policy of rebalancing Asia which attaches importance to engagement in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. is deploying all types of warships including destroyers and subs equipped with Aegis system in the Pacific and introducing new type hardware to its military bases in Japan under the pretext of "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 Last year the U.S. Department of State announced its troops in Japan would automatically be involved in case of contingency on the Korean peninsula without prior discussion with the Japanese government. The U.S. moves for arms buildup in the area around the Korean peninsula are a serious provocation that can hardly be overlooked.

articles.title: S. Koreans Call for Creating Peaceful Climate
articles.content:
S. Koreans Call for Creating Peaceful Climate
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea are strongly demanding the authorities refrain from conducting a nuclear war drills against fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces and opt for creating a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula. 
					 Organizations including those for peace against war and for reunification and labor movement said that all forms of war drills conducted by the U.S. and south Korea every year under the pretext of "annual ones" are ones for mounting a preemptive attack on the north in view of their goal and nature and scope of military hardware involved.
					
					 The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty held that the war drills staged in conspiracy with foreign forces resulted in threatening the peace on the Korean peninsula and driving the south-north relations into collapse.
					
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification stressed that the war drills should be halted at once as they are throwing a wet blanket over the atmosphere of south-north dialogue and reconciliation, adding a peaceful climate should be created through dialogue, not by confrontation and war.
					
					 The People's Action for Peace against War said: In order to turn the confrontational south-north relations into ones for reconciliation and cooperation, the south Korean authorities should totally stop all hostile military acts including joint military exercises with the U.S. and opt for improving relations. 
					
					 Youth, students, workers, peasants and other people of south Korea said peace never comes of its own accord, adding they will take the lead in the efforts for preventing a war and achieving peace.
					
					 Internet paper Minjok Ilbo said that the situation is getting extremely tense due to the north-targeted war drills of the U.S. and south Korean authorities and the situation on the peninsula is so tense that a war may break out anytime.

articles.title: S. Korean Citizen Sentenced to Prison Term for Praising DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Citizen Sentenced to Prison Term for Praising DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Jonju District Court of south Korea sentenced a south Korean citizen to a prison term on Jan. 18 on charges of the violation of the "Security Law" for the mere reason that he praised the DPRK, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The court charged that he had posted "enemy-benefiting literature" including articles praising the Songun politics of the north on internet and kept relevant data.
					
					 The SL is holding sway in south Korea, dampening the desire for justice and truth.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Demands Measures against Mistreatment of Children
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Demands Measures against Mistreatment of Children
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A demonstration and signature campaign are going on in Inchon, south Korea in demand of measures against the mistreatment of children, according to south Korean Yonhap News on January 16.
					 These actions are supported by people from all walks of life in south Korea, including South Jolla Province. They are conducting a signature campaign in demand of investigation into the cases of ill-treatment of children and severe punishment of perpetrators. 
					
					 Even according to official statistics, south Korea witnessed more than 6 790 cases of maltreatment of children in 2013, causing the highest child mortality rate since 2001.
					
					 The number of those cases about which complaints were made had reached 10 240 from Jan. to Aug. 2014, an increase of 36 percent over the previous year.
					
					 2012 alone witnessed more than 8 400 child vagrants caused by the ruin of families due to abject poverty.
					
					 This miserable reality clearly proves that south Korea is the world's worst tundra of human rights.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Held by Korean Social Scientists in Japan
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Held by Korean Social Scientists in Japan
						
 Tokyo, January 19 (KNS-KCNA) -- A seminar on the New Year address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 104 (2015) was held by Korean social scientists in Japan at the Korean Press Hall in Tokyo on Jan. 16.
					 Kim Jong Un set forth important tasks to win victories in the drive for defending socialism and on all fronts for building a thriving nation this year and thus glorify the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea as revolutionary, great auspicious events, speakers said.
					
					 The Korean people have turned out in the general offensive for the dignity of the socialist homeland and prosperity, full of conviction of final victory, they noted.
					
					 The DPRK is attaching special significance to promoting the wellbeing of the people, they said, adding: A turn will be effected in improving the people's living standards and building an economic giant this significant year.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year address underlined the need to ease tension and create a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula, improve inter-Korean relations and thus open up a broad avenue to independent reunification, they said.
					
					 They called upon the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans in Japan to turn out as one in the nationwide movement to reunify the country.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked by Koreans in China
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrations for the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated by the General Association of Koreans in China on Jan. 8.
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a meeting, film show and other colorful events in praise of the sacred revolutionary career and undying exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (his birth anniversary).

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Political Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Political Figures
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Political figures of Poland and South Africa issued statements on Jan. 14 in support of the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Juzef Lachut, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee of the Polish Communist Party, said that in his New Year address Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, put forward the tasks to further consolidate the DPRK's invincible might as a socialist political and ideological power and accelerate the building of an economic giant in this year seeing the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The chairman went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un called for writing a new chapter in the history of inter-Korean relations by creating a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula and bringing about a great change in the above-said relations in this year seeing the 70th anniversary of the division of the Korean nation by outsiders.
					
					 We, aspiring after the world's peace, fully support the proposals of the DPRK to create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula and improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The coordinator of a regional executive committee of the Gauteng Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's New Year address instills confidence in sure victory and optimism into the Korean people and all other progressive people loving justice and truth.
					
					 His proposals for national reunification are fair and aboveboard ones to make it possible to independently and peacefully resolve the issue of Korea's reunification in the common interests of the nation and free from any foreign interference, transcending differences in ideology and social system.
					
					 We fully back his realistic proposals for Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Germany
						
 Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany formed its preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il on Jan. 15.
					 The chairman of the Forum was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange colorful political and cultural events such as a seminar, round-table talks and film show for praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il from January 15 to February 16.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion conjunta de gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de RPDC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion conjunta de gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 20 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion conjunta del gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea orientada a cumplir las tareas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en cuanto a la reunificacion de la patria.
					Asistieron Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios directivos de las entidades de masas y las sociales, los relacionados con el Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y con las direcciones nortenas de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria y otros representantes del gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la RPDC. 
					
					En el foro se debatio el tema "Para abrir un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion en ese ano del aniversario 70 de la liberacion de la patria en pleno acato al historico mensaje del ano nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un".
					
					El vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, presento el informe y el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Kim Yong Dae, el secretario general del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, Kang Ji Yong, y el presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, Hyon Sang Ju, pronunciaron discursos. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un refleja mas correctamente el ardiente anhelo y voluntad por la reunificacion de toda la nacion coreana y llama a todos los coreanos al movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad. 
					
					Destacaron que es preciso eliminar el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, aliviar la tension y preparar el ambiente pacifico. 
					
					Urgieron a EE.UU. a cambiar con audaz su politica sobre Corea, sin instigar a las autoridades surcoreanas a la confrontacion fratricida ni recurrir a la anacronica politica hostil a la RPDC y las imprudentes maniobras de agresion. 
					
					Destacaron que la sociedad internacional y los paises que tienen interes en el problema de la Peninsula Coreana no deben instigar la confrontacion entre los coreanos ni empeorar la situacion sino enviar el apoyo y solidaridad con los ingentes esfuerzos de la RPDC por la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reintegracion territorial del pais. 
					
					Apuntaron que ambas partes coreanas deben lograr la gran unidad nacional bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", sin perseguir el enfrentamiento de sistemas absolutizando su ideologia y regimen, y resolver el problema de reunificacion conforme a los intereses comunes de la nacion. 
					
					Ratificaron que la RPDC esta lista para consultar con sinceridad y resolver con magnanimidad todos los problemas que se presenten en la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur y agregaron que si las autoridades surcoreanas tienen la verdadera posicion de mejorar las relaciones bilaterales mediante dialogos, es posible reanudar los contactos de alto nivel y sostener conversaciones por sectores.
					
					En este ano del 70o aniversario de la division nacional todos los coreanos en el Norte y el Sur de Corea deben marchar para lograr nuevo salto en el movimiento por la reunificacion bajo el noble ideal de la gran unidad nacional por encima de las ideologias, idearios, criterios politicos y doctrinas, concluyeron. 
					
					En el foro fue aprobado el llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Embajador de Cuba ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajador de Cuba ofrece banquete 
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 56o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba acreditado en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez ofrecio el dia 20 un banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					Fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, el presidente del Comite de Educacion y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, Kim Sung Du, la presidenta del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jong Suk, y Pak Kun Gwang, Sin Hong Chol y otros funcionarios coreanos. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la sede diplomatica cubana en Corea. 
					
					El embajador cubano dijo en su discurso que el primero de enero de 1959, el pueblo cubano acogio una nueva aurora y agrego que durante 56 anos transcurridos Cuba ha logrado muchas victorias.
					
					Afirmo que el pueblo cubano considera como orgullo las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el pueblo coreano diligente, inteligente y heroico guiado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Subrayo que Cuba hara ingentes esfuerzos por desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y deseo mayor progreso al pueblo coreano con motivo del Ano Nuevo 2015. 
					
					Yang Hyong Sop dijo en su discurso que el triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana fue un acontecimiento historico que abrio el camino de la vida independiente al pueblo cubano que durante varios siglos sufria las explotaciones y opresiones y proclamo el nacimiento del primer pais socialista en el continente americano. 
					
					Refirio que bajo la guia de los estimados companeros Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz, el pueblo cubano ha venido avanzando la causa socialista librando una lucha heroica. 
					
					El pueblo coreano esta complacido de los exitos alcanzados por el pueblo cubano en la materializacion de la resolucion del VI Congreso del Partido Comunista de Cuba, dijo y apunto que en adelante tambien los coreanos estaran siempre junto con el hermano pueblo cubano en la lucha conjunta por la victoria de la causa antiimperialista por la independencia y el socialismo.

articles.title: Publicado llamamiento a toda la nacion
articles.content:
Publicado llamamiento a toda la nacion 
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- En la reunion conjunta del gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, efectuada el dia 20 en Pyongyang, fue aprobado un llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana. 
					El texto senala:
					
					El mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un sirve de bandera estimulante y poste de senal de la sagrada lucha de este ano por abrir el ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar. 
					
					!Que toda la nacion en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar responda al llamamiento del historico mensaje con la lucha pannacional para la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion de la patria en este ano en que se determinaran la perspectiva de la reunificacion de la patria y el futuro de la nacion!
					
					Mantenemos la invariable posicion de marchar mano a mano con todos los que aman al pais y nacion y aspiran a la reunificacion de la patria sin absolutizar las diferencias de ideologias y regimenes. 
					
					Si consideran a la parte connacional como "enemiga" y persigue unilateralmente la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" rechazando nuestra ideologia y regimen, no se mejoraran nunca las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					!Hagamos del presente del 70o aniversario de la division nacional y del 65o aniversario del estallido de la guerra coreana el primer ano sin ejercicios belicos conjuntos, que se libran con las fuerzas extranjeras contra la parte connacional, y el historico ano de inicio de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana!
					
					Estamos listos para resolver con sinceridad todos los problemas que se presentan en la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y ya hemos aclarado la posicion importante sobre el dialogo Norte-Sur. 
					
					Ambas partes deben dejar de perder el tiempo y las fuerzas con las disputas insignificantes con los problemas de menos importancia.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben abandonar la imprudente "teoria de unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" que motiva el enfrentamiento y la guerra y resolver el problema de la reunificacion a favor de los intereses comunes de la nacion. Y al mismo tiempo, deben dirigirse a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad con una nueva concepcion y nueva posicion liberandose del proceder estrecho y hostil. 
					
					Los partidos politicos y entidades del Sur de Corea deben incorporarse a la fuerte corriente de la historia para traer cambio radical en las relaciones Norte-Sur sin frenarla ni obstaculizarla. 
					
					Hay que celebrar significativamente el 15o aniversario de publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria como grandes jubilos nacionales a ser registrados en la historia del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					!Ambas partes coreanas libren los actos conjuntos nacionales y abran con solemnidad los actos pro-reunificacion por capas para que en el territorio patrio de tres mil ries donde viven los connacionales resuenen las aclamaciones por la reunificacion y reine el fervor de la unidad nacional!
					
					!Liguemos la arteria y los lazos de la nacion y manifestemos a todo el mundo la superioridad y la comunidad nacionales mediante la promocion de los contactos e intercambios en los deportes, cultura y otros dominios entre ambas partes coreanas!
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, expresamos la esperanza de que los paises interesados y la sociedad internacional envien el apoyo y solidaridad a nuestros ingentes esfuerzos por la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion de la patria sin instigar la confrontacion fratricida ni empeorar la situacion en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Volvemos a exhortar a todos los integrantes de la nacion en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar a levantarse como un solo hombre con el unico alma patriotico por la reunificacion para abrir en este ano significativo el ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente de la patria.

articles.title: Parten militares para visitar lugar de batalla revolucionaria de monte Madu
articles.content:
Parten militares para visitar lugar de batalla revolucionaria de monte Madu
						
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea visitaran el lugar de batalla revolucionaria del monte Madu.
					Este lugar, acondicionado como base secreta en la zona de Anju durante la lucha armada antijaponesa, fue un centro de direccion regional y de operaciones militares de la region occidental.
					
					En el lugar estan impregnadas las imperecederas hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung realizadas para la historica causa de la liberacion de la patria.
					
					En la presente visita participaran los ejemplares uniformados de todo el ejercito y los seleccionados en las escuelas militares a todos los niveles y las escuelas revolucionarias.
					
					Tuvo lugar hoy el acto de partida frente a las estatuas de bronce de los generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Ante todo, los participantes depositaron cesto  y ramos de flores ante las estatuas de bronce de estos grandes hombres y les rindieron el sublime homenaje.
					
					Tras el informe de Om Hyang Chol, presidente del Comite de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en el EPC, hubo las intervenciones de juramento de los oficiales y los suboficiales.
					
					Los militares del EPC iniciaron la marcha hacia el lugar de batalla revolucionaria del monte Paektu enarbolando las banderas con imagenes sonrientes de los generalisimos y la otra con inscripciones "No abandone la conviccion revolucionaria aunque muera".

articles.title: Iniciada 41a Competencia Deportiva Nacional de Jovenes y Ninos Escolares
articles.content:
Iniciada 41a Competencia Deportiva Nacional de Jovenes y Ninos Escolares 
						
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciada la 41a Competencia Deportiva Nacional de Jovenes y Ninos Escolares por el Premio Jongilbong.
					El certamen se efectuara desde enero hasta agosto en Pyongyang, la ciudad de Phyongsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, la ciudad de Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte con la participacion de mas de 10 mil jovenes y ninos escolares de todo el pais. 
					
					En el marco del certamen, que se realiza dividido en las ramas de escuelas secundarias superiores, escuelas secundarias basicas y escuelas primarias, se entablaran las competencias de 17 disciplinas, entre otras, baloncesto, voleibol, tenis de mesa, taekwondo y sirum (lucha coreana).
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion tuvo lugar el dia 20 en el Centro de Baloncesto de la capitalina Avenida Chongchun. 
					
					Participaron el presidente del Comite de Educacion Kim Sung Du, los funcionarios interesados, los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung y los jovenes y ninos escolares. 
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la UJS, Jong Yong Nam pronuncio un discurso de apertura. 
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, se efectuo la competencia de baloncesto (m) entre la Escuela Secundaria Superior Kang Pan Sok y la Escuela Secundaria Superior de Undok del municipio de Hanggu de la ciudad de Nampho.

articles.title: Se preve explicacion de inversion sobre desarrollo de zona turistica Wonsan-monte Kumgang
articles.content:
Se preve explicacion de inversion sobre desarrollo de zona turistica Wonsan-monte Kumgang
Pyongyang, 20 de enero (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar entre abril y mayo la explicacion de inversion sobre el desarrollo de zona turistica internacional Wonsan-monte Kumgang. Los empresarios compatriotas en ultramar y los inversionistas extranjeros expresan gran interes sobre el respecto.
					O Ung Gil, director general de la compania general para el desarrollo de region de Wonsan, dijo a la ACNC que esta previsto tambien el turismo de los participantes a la ciudad de Wonsan y la region del monte Kumgang, y prosiguio:
					
					En junio del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche fue proclamado el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema sobre la creacion de la zona turistica internacional Wonsan-monte Kumgang de la RPDC, segun lo cual se inicio ya la labor de desarrollo.
					
					Se completo el plan general de desarrollo y estan en su plenitud la elaboracion de planes por sectores, la construccion y la reparacion de la infraestructura.
					
					El area total de desarrollo es mas de 430 kilometros cuadrados y en ello se incluyen la ciudad de Wonsan y algunas zonas de los distritos de Popdong, Anbyon, Thongchon, Kosong y Kumgang de la provincia de Kangwon.
					
					En las mencionadas zonas se hallan renombradas reliquias historicas, muchos recursos turisticos y lugares famosos incluyendo los templos Phyohun, Singye y Sokwang, la ermita Podok, los lagos Sijung y Tongjong, la cascada Ullim y la playa Songdowon.
					
					La belleza de montanas y valles del monte Kumgang, los paisajes naturales de los farallones Chongsokjong y del lago Samil son reconocidos como ocho paisajes famosos de Corea y de la provincia de Kangwon. En estos ultimos anos se levantaron magnificamente el Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon y el Campo de Esqui Masikryong. 
					
					Tratamos activar el intercambio sobre los diferentes modos de inversion para convertir esa zona en un polo turistico dotado de elevado nivel y gran capacidad de servicios.
					
					El rumbo principal del desarrollo de la zona es impulsar simultaneamente la explotacion y el turismo cuya meta es convertir dicha zona en un polo turistico de talla mundial.
